DOC.detailed_description: Endovascular revascularization superficial femoral artery ( SFA ) become one commonly perform endovascular procedures.The ability offer patient alternative surgical revascularization , limited significant morbidity mortality , same-day outpatient percutaneous procedure underlies popularity endovascular approach . Although surgical bypass SFA remain gold standard revascularization , associate significant morbidity mortality.Comparative data cryoplasty , angioplasty stenting SFA ultimately require provide robust evidence efficacy mode therapy.This registry design determine efficacy three different percutaneous revascularization strategy ( Cryoplasty vs. Stent Placement vs. Atherectomy ) treatment lifestyle limit low extremity claudication .
